thread.title: Lawyers call for statutory protection of lawyer-client communications (The Law Society)
thread.title_full: Lawyers call for statutory protection of lawyer-client communications (The Law Society) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Lawyers call for statutory protection of lawyer-client communications (The Law Society)
text: ( Source : The Law Society ) Joint press release from the Law Society and the Bar Council The statutory protection of legally privileged communications between lawyers and their clients should be high on the agenda when parliament debates
